text: Industrial metal is a heavy metal musical genre that draws from industrial music and many different types of heavy metal, using repeating metal guitar riffs, sampling, synthesizer or sequencer lines, and distorted vocals. Founding industrial metal acts include Ministry,Di Perna 1995a, page 69. Godflesh, and KMFDM.Di Perna 1995a, page 69. Industrial metal's popularity led to some criticism from other artists associated with the industrial scene. Subsequently, it is most well known in various European permutations. Industrial metal groups have produced many acclaimed music videos. ==References== Category:Heavy metal subgenres Category:Industrial music Category:Fusion music genres
title: Industrial metal
